titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to specify the use of computers in or affecting commerce as a basis for Federal prosecution of certain obscenity offenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 1/4/1995--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code to make the use of computers in or affecting interstate or foreign commerce a basis for Federal prosecution of certain obscenity offenses.
